Articles.Content:
Hi, when adding to My Folder of parts package B-9, I crashed the game completely. I get this, help!!

_____________________________________________________________________________________

Unity Player [version: Unity 4.1.2f1_911c7369eeac]

KSP.exe caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)

in module KSP.exe at 0023:01463b9c.

Error occurred at 2013-07-05_131246.

N:\KSP_0.20.2\KSP.exe, run by Nelson.

94% memory in use.

3582 MB physical memory [212 MB free].

0 MB paging file [1926 MB free].

0 MB user address space [196 MB free].

Read from location 00000000 caused an access violation.

Context:

EDI: 0x0017eb64 ESI: 0x00000000 EAX: 0x00000010

EBX: 0x0017eb64 ECX: 0x00000004 EDX: 0x00000000

EIP: 0x01463b9c EBP: 0x0017eb44 SegCs: 0x00000023

EFlags: 0x00210297 ESP: 0x0017eb3c SegSs: 0x0000002b

Bytes at CS:EIP:

8b 44 8e f0 89 44 8f f0 8b 44 8e f4 89 44 8f f4

Edited July 7, 2013 by nelson09-i-igo1
